column4: hi there. what does it mean when my xserver can't run and says: Failed to load module "fglrx" (module req. mismatch,0) No drivers available? i installed the ati driver from ati.com because the kernel integrated ones won't work.
yes i have an ati card. that's why i'm trying to install them.
now how can i check if my driver is installed properly?
lol sorry didnt see the second line

i did dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg after installing the packages from the ati.com installer then i did what they say in the wiki under binary drivers ati. aticonfig --initial and another aticonfig command... then after reboot it gives me this error
nice. did you experience a similar problem with your one?
can you suggest a good command line http browser? i don't want to reconfigure x just to read this thread..
i remeber i had to fix the xorg.conf
i'm looking for a command line browser. anybody?
sorry im not that far in to linux yet
